name: dataset_name
description: Name of the dataset this record belongs to

name: split_type
description: Data split type (train, test, validation, etc.)

name: content
description: Main content of the record (text or JSON for multimodal)

name: metadata
description: Arbitrary metadata associated with the record

name: alt_text
description: Textual description or transcript of media content

name: uri
description: URI pointing to original source of content

name: mime
description: Primary MIME type of the content

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when record was last updated
